participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Caring and responsible, Sarah has a nurturing side, especially as she prepares for the arrival of her twins.
participant_1.background: a already have a children. i work at a bank. i am expecting twins in two months. i am an omnivore. i just bought my first home.

participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Jake loves to hang out with friends and is full of youthful energy.
participant_2.background: i'm 19 and i cannot wait to move out my parents home. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i work took i have a part time job at burger king. i just want to have fun with my friends.

content.text: Hey! Are you an omnivore? Because I am.
